resources.string: Two functions depending on a single variable
This tutorial shows how to record two functions in a single program or how to show intermediate result of a program.
Raise variable to the second power

When you run this program it will stop execution at the point of HALT operation. Top line will indicate RUN HALT and the result button will change to continue button. Scren will show the intermediate result of a program. Press continue button to execute the rest part of a program. Number of halts is unlimited.
